string-array.name: itDepartmentBasicInfo
string-array.item: Since when has the world of computer software design keen about what people want? This is a simple question of evolution. The day is not so far when every knee will bow down to a silicon fist, and you will all beg your binary Gods for mercy.
To provide value based high quality IT education by empowering every student to be innovative and employable IT professional.
